channel.title: Webclient issues
channel.description:
I'm having an issue with the Moparscape webclient. (I wish I wasn't using the webclient but the link to download the client for Mac is broken, last time I checked this VERY helpful thread <_< [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.0.html[/url])
Every time I try to login, I always get a an error message, saying that the server "must be down". Don't worry, I made sure to click the "Start Server" button. Please, I just need to know what is the problem. Thanks.

item.title: Webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Iz_Fire Dark Iz Fire
item.description:
@Dark_Iz_Fire wrote:

Have you downloaded the most recent java? if u have idk keep tryin serv ips i cant think of any other reason why you cant get on other pplz servs.

Read full topic

People are trying

item.title: Webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Moo_Man1 Mr. Moo Man1
item.description:
@Mr_Moo_Man1 wrote:

But see, that’s what I did. I entered the server IP, put in the new port for it, and it still doesn’t work. Maybe there’s something wrong with my computer? (maybe because I’m using a MAC?) It would’ve been a lot easier if the link for the mac client in that VERY helpful thread I linked to in the first post (sarcasm) wasn’t broken.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2007, 07:47:52 PM[/size][hr]I still need help. Would it kill somebody to just give me some help? I wouldn’t be posting if that was the case…

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Iz_Fire Dark Iz Fire
item.description:
@Dark_Iz_Fire wrote:

Use the moparscape server status type in the ip address and port and if the server is online u should be able to connect to there server…if it says its online it could be off because the status updates every like 30 min so yea try another serv until u get on one. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Moo_Man1 Mr. Moo Man1
item.description:
@Mr_Moo_Man1 wrote:

I tried, I entered the IP for the server I wanted to go into…and I STILL get error message because according to the client, “IT MUST BE DOWN”. (Meanwhile on the server status list, the one I chose was supposedly running at 100%)

_>

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

I don’t think you can run your own Server on the Webclient. Try connecting to other servers using their IPs.

Read full topic
